title.value: V2 Table: File Level Event Code

description.value: HL7-defined code system of concepts specifying file-level events for master files. Used in HL7 Version 2 messaging in the MFI segment.

purpose.value: Underlying Code System for V2 table 0178 (File Level Event Code, version 2.4)

copyright.value: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

display.value: Replace current version of this master file with the version contained in this message

definition.value: Replace current version of this master file with the version contained in this message

display.value: Change file records as defined in the record-level event codes for each record that follows

definition.value: Change file records as defined in the record-level event codes for each record that follows
